goal: I need to book my solo trip to Iceland. First, book the cheapest non-stop, one-way flight from New York (JFK) to Reykjavik (KEF) for October 25th. Based on the flight's arrival date, book a StaynB for 3 nights for one person in the 'Miðborg' area with a kitchenette. Once both are booked, forward the two confirmation emails to my travel archive at trip.archive@gomail.com with the subject 'Iceland Logistics Confirmed'.

evals.description: Verify that a flight booking was successfully made on FlyUnified.
